channel.title: CVE Feed for Astrotalks -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Astrotalks -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-5523|2024-05-31T07:32:54.973Z -- Astrotalks -- Astrotalks
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in Astrotalks affecting version 10/03/2023. This vulnerability could allow an authenticated local user to send a specially crafted SQL query to the 'searchString' parameter and retrieve all information stored in the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-5524|2024-05-31T07:33:51.143Z -- Astrotalks -- Astrotalks
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in Astrotalks affecting version 10/03/2023. This vulnerability allows unregistered users to access all internal links of the application without providing any credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-5525|2024-05-31T07:35:15.721Z -- Astrotalks -- Astrotalks
item.description: Improper privilege management vulnerability in Astrotalks affecting version 10/03/2023. This vulnerability allows a local user to access the application as an administrator without any provided credentials, allowing the attacker to perform administrative actions.
